cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 135 mi SSW of Apalachecola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast toward Florida Big Bend and then recurving northeastward along the U.S. Atlantic seaboard
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend between Mexico Beach and Suwannee River

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from north of Surf City NC to Oregon Inlet including Pamlico Sound; Hurricane Watch Anclote River to Suwannee River FL and west of Mexico Beach to Walton/Bay County line FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Suwannee River FL to Mexico Beach FL; Tropical Storm Warning Englewood to Suwannee River FL, west of Mexico Beach to Walton/Bay County line FL, and Flagler/Volusia County line FL to Surf City NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impacts expected along Florida Gulf Coast (Big Bend), then coastal Georgia, South Carolina and North Carolina, extending northward to the Mid-Atlantic and southern New England coasts
weather_observation.wind: Breezy outer-rain-band gusts possible; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (â‰¤34 kt probability only 3%)
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected along the Mississippi coast; forecast surge heights remain below 3 ft west of Destin FL
weather_observation.rainfall: Passing outer bands may bring 1-2 in of rain; widespread 4-inch totals not expected at Pascagoula
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated thunderstorms with brief gusty winds and reduced visibility in squalls; otherwise minimal operational hazards anticipated
